original_title: S.O.B. and the Legend of Alan Schafer
overview: A documentary about the world's biggest Mexican themed roadside attraction, South of the Border and its eccentric owner Alan Schafer. This film explores SOB's humble beginnings and Schafer's larger than life story as he fought the KKK, and ended up serving time in jail for voting fraud.
title: S.O.B. and the Legend of Alan Schafer
